briefTitle: 2% Chlorhexidine Gluconate Skin Cloths to Prevent SSI in Spine Surgery Patients

interventions.name: 2% chlorhexidine gluconate cloths
otherNames: SAGE patient preoperative skin preparation cloths

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

Patients scheduled for a neuro-spine procedure and have 2 of the following risk factors:

* Diabetic OR
* BMI\>30 OR
* ASA\>2 OR
* pre-operatively hospitalized OR
* \>60 years old OR
* chronic steroids/immunosuppressive medications OR
* prior history of SSI

Exclusion Criteria:

* Unable to consent
* Non English speaking
* Known allergy to any of the ingredients contained in SAGE chlorhexidine gluconate cloths
* Current infection or history of spine infections
* Patients with tumors or intradural spinal pathology.

outcomeMeasures.title: Participants With Surgical Site Infection Development at 30 Days Post-operative
outcomeMeasures.description: Evaluation daily using the CDC guidelines, daily measurements and deidentified photos

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Positive or Abnormal Skin Cultures on Day of Surgery, Day of Discharge, 30 Days Post-op
outcomeMeasures.description: Skin swabs collected on Day of Surgery, Day of Discharge, 30 days post-op
